R

ReadBItems() - Method in class Users.Guest
This method Reads all bought items from guest's file Firstly deleting all items from list boughtItems Then scanning each line, each line = item Using Factory creates item of an certain collection BAYC or CP And then adds it to the list
ReadGuests() - Static method in class Gui.MainMenu
Reads Guests from the list Guests.txt and adds them to the list

* Reads items from Items.txt and adds them to the list

Reg(String, String, String, String, Alert, Alert, Stage) - Static method in class Controllers.NewAuctionController
Method first of all checks input data to be correct then checks if auction with such name already exists if all of the checks is passed, auction will be stored as a new line with data in Items.txt
